snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 535: Sonic Mania Fan Game (SAGE2016)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic Mania Fan Game (Studiopolis Zone) - SAGE2016
Credit: YESMEN10
Release Date: October 15th, 2016

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Boos&Stuff
00:55 - Studiopolis Zone Act 1 - Shadow
07:35 - Credits
07:59 - Studiopolis Zone Act 1 - Sonic
13:13 - Studiopolis Zone Act 1 - Tails
18:15 - Studiopolis Zone Act 1 - Knuckles
23:24 - Studiopolis Zone Act 1 - Amy
32:08 - Super Mode Brief

NOTES: Now that we are back to reality from the previous Mania adventure.
We can actually play some Mania! Sorta... Kinda... Close enough.
Let's pretend Mania was not released yet and this is one of those titles that was made.
To distract you from the waiting and give you a fan take on what it could be like.
Sonic & Friends find themselves in Studiopolis Zone, while not that many lights, there is plenty of Cameras for Action.
That being said this Camera is more zoomed out than it should be, not that its bad but still.
So overall it plays fine all characters have their own take on the level which is moderately long.
Couple of set pieces here and there to encounter, no Boss stuff or anything.
At the end of it all you get the option to mess around in Super form.
In conclusion it was to give a taste of a Mania level concept until the actual release.
